summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: after auth the app renders a dedicated New App placeholder page with no visible chat/settings navigation, and the page includes a multi-line description input stored in local state plus a primary capture button that shows an inline confirmation. The diff also adds/expands PWA/service-worker and install-entry UI and branded footer elements that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker registration / PWA-related behavior added to the main app flow (registerServiceWorker call).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to replace the primary UI flow with a New App placeholder and add a local-only idea capture input; it did not request adding or changing PWA/service worker behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Install prompt entry point added to the AppShell header (InstallEntryPoint + vertical separator).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; this adds new UI/functionality unrelated to the New App placeholder and idea capture requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Branded footer link to caffeine.ai and “Built with …” footer content added/changed in AppShell.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements; adds new branding/UX elements beyond the placeholder experience and input capture.
